relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: downregulate
relations.text: IFN-gamma treatment resulted in a rapid reduction of both peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor (PPAR) protein and mRNA.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: downregulate
relations.text: A 48-h exposure to IFN-gamma also resulted in a decrease of both CCAAT/enhancer-binding alpha and sterol regulatory element binding protein (SREBP-1) expression.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: downregulate
relations.text: A 48-h exposure to IFN-gamma also resulted in a decrease of both CCAAT/enhancer-binding alpha and sterol regulatory element binding protein (SREBP-1) expression.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: In addition, exposure to IFN-gamma resulted in a substantial increase in STAT 1 expression.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: In addition, exposure to IFN-gamma resulted in a small increase in STAT 3 expression.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: inhibit
relations.text: IFN-gamma treatment of 3T3-L1 adipocytes (48-96 h) resulted in a substantial inhibition of insulin-sensitive glucose uptake.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: induce
relations.text: These data clearly demonstrate that IFN-gamma treatment results in the development of insulin resistance.

relations.head: Interferon gamma
relations.label: affects
relations.text: Interferon-gamma (IFN-gamma) is known primarily for its roles in immunological responses but also has been shown to affect fat metabolism and adipocyte gene expression

relations.label: affects

relations.head: Peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor gamma
relations.label: degraded by
relations.text: Our studies clearly demonstrated that the IFN-gamma-induced loss of PPARgamma protein is partially inhibited in the presence of two distinct proteasome inhibitors
